attributes.action: We should move the Covid19 vaccination program to 24/7 on a needs basis.
attributes.additional_details: Rolling out the vaccine sooner will revive our economy much sooner and improve British economic and mental health.
attributes.background:
We want the government to roll out the Covid19 vaccine as an emergency should be treated.    

Vaccinations should take place 24 hours per day, 7 days per week on a needs first basis.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
